channel.title: Jolt Environment 666
channel.description:
I am new to setting jolt up and have done everything in the readme from setting up the database and putting the cache files in the correct folder in commons. I am having an error when starting gameserver, Masterserver started just fine though.
-- SYSTEM ERROR DETECTED -- System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'System.DBNull' to type 'System.String'. at RuneScape.GameServer.Model.World.Initialize(Int16 id) at System.Dynamic.UpdateDelegates.UpdateAndExecuteVoid2[T0,T1](CallSite site, T0 arg0, T1 arg1) at RuneScape.GameServer.Engine.Initialize()
Any help on this would be appreciated.
Gameserver INI: [code]################################# ## GAMESERVER CONFIGURATIONS ## #################################
# Master database string:master.database.host=127.0.0.1 uint16:master.database.port=3306 string:master.database.user=root string:master.database.pass=root string:master.database.name=runescape boolean:master.database.compression=false boolean:master.database.pooling=true uint32:master.database.minpoolsize=1 uint32:master.database.maxpoolsize=100
# Main connection string:tcpconnection.localip=127.0.0.1 uint16:tcpconnection.port=443 int32:tcpconnection.maxconnections=100 boolean:tcpconnection.logconnections=true boolean:tcpconnection.checkblacklist=true
# Remote Connection string:remoteconnection.localip=127.0.0.1 int32:remoteconnection.port = 43596
# Login Server Connection string:loginserver.ip=127.0.0.1 uint16:loginserver.port=43596 string:loginserver.password=1337
# World Configuration int16:world.id=1
# Cache Configuration string:cache.filepath=..\\..\\Commons\\cache[/code]

item.title: Jolt Environment 666
item.dc:creator: @tippythop tippythop
item.description:
@tippythop wrote:

I am new to setting jolt up and have done everything in the readme from setting up the database and putting the cache files in the correct folder in commons. I am having an error when starting gameserver, Masterserver started just fine though.

– SYSTEM ERROR DETECTED –
System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type ‘System.DBNull’ to type ‘System.String’.
at RuneScape.GameServer.Model.World.Initialize(Int16 id)
at System.Dynamic.UpdateDelegates.UpdateAndExecuteVoid2[T0,T1](CallSite site, T0 arg0, T1 arg1)
at RuneScape.GameServer.Engine.Initialize()

Any help on this would be appreciated.

Gameserver INI:

[code]#################################

GAMESERVER CONFIGURATIONS

#################################

Master database

string:master.database.host=127.0.0.1
uint16:master.database.port=3306
string:master.database.user=root
string:master.database.pass=root
string:master.database.name=runescape
boolean:master.database.compression=false
boolean:master.database.pooling=true
uint32:master.database.minpoolsize=1
uint32:master.database.maxpoolsize=100

Main connection

string:tcpconnection.localip=127.0.0.1
uint16:tcpconnection.port=443
int32:tcpconnection.maxconnections=100
boolean:tcpconnection.logconnections=true
boolean:tcpconnection.checkblacklist=true

Remote Connection

string:remoteconnection.localip=127.0.0.1
int32:remoteconnection.port = 43596

Login Server Connection

string:loginserver.ip=127.0.0.1
uint16:loginserver.port=43596
string:loginserver.password=1337

World Configuration

int16:world.id=1

Cache Configuration

string:cache.filepath=…\…\Commons\cache[/code]

Read full topic
